sentences.en: Explorers traced the Nile River to its several headstreams in Central Africa.
sentences.cn: 探险者在中非找到了尼罗河的几处源头.

sentences.en: Here the Nile broadens out between the huge granite boulders.
sentences.cn: 尼罗河在此处变宽，从两块花岗岩巨石间穿过。

sentences.en: Such boats can navigate on the Nile.
sentences.cn: 这种船可以在尼罗河上航行。

sentences.en: The Aswan Dam harnessed ( the waters of ) the Nile.
sentences.cn: 阿斯安水坝利用尼罗河 ( 的水流 ) 产生动力.

sentences.en: The Aswan Dam helps to control the River Nile in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 阿斯旺水坝有助于控制埃及的尼罗河.

sentences.en: The Egyptians strove with the Romans for the possession of the Nile Valley.
sentences.cn: 埃及人为占有尼罗河谷而与罗马人斗争.

sentences.en: The Nile discharges itself into the Mediterranean.
The Nile floods the fields and deposits mud on them.
sentences.cn: 尼罗河泛滥,在田野上淤积一层泥.

sentences.en: The Nile flows from Lake Victoria in East Africa north to the Mediterranean Sea.
sentences.cn: 尼罗河由东非的维多利亚湖向北流至地中海。

sentences.en: The Nile Valley keeps a temperate climate throughout the year.
sentences.cn: 尼罗河流域一年四季气候温和。

sentences.en: The ship is sailing up the Nile.
sentences.cn: 这艘船顺尼罗河向上游航行.

sentences.en: When the Nile is in flood, it deposits a layer of mud on the fields.
sentences.cn: 尼罗河泛滥时, 在田野上沉积下一层泥.

sentences.en: When the River Nile is in flood, it deposits a layer of mud on the fields.
sentences.cn: 尼罗河泛滥时, 便在田野上沉积一层泥.

sentences.en: Where does the Blue Nile meet the White Nile?
sentences.cn: 青尼罗河和白尼罗河在什么地方汇合?

sentences.en: Where is the source of the Nile?

phrases.tran_cn: 蓝色尼罗河（公司名称）；青尼罗河（东非河流）；青尼罗省（苏丹）

trans.tran_cn: number of inverters along any loop is even 任一回路的反相器数目均为偶数
